regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re,requests def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m):#streamwatcher2013 source=requests.get('https://fullmatchsports.co/',headers={'user-agent':'Mozilla/5.0','accept':'*/*'}).content data=re.findall('"content-thumbnail".+?href="([^"]+).+?:\s*(.*?)\s*Full.+?src="([^"]+)',source) for pn in range(2,11): pages='https://fullmatchsports.co/page/'+str(pn)+'/' source=requests.get(pages,headers={'user-agent':'Mozilla/5.0','accept':'*/*'}).content data +=re.findall('"content-thumbnail".+?href="([^"]+).+?:\s*(.*?)\s*Full.+?src="([^"]+)',source) return data

regex.name: getUrl
